TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StaticSiteMapProvider extends System.Web.SiteMapProvider
Public MustInherit Class StaticSiteMapProvider Inherits SiteMapProvider
public ref class StaticSiteMapProvider abstract : System::Web::SiteMapProvider

summary.span: 作为 抽象类的部分实现和 类（它是 ASP.NET 中的默认站点地图提供程序）的基类。

span.span: Serves as a partial implementation of the abstract class and serves as a base class for the class, which is the default site map provider in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是抽象类的部分实现, 提供两个附加方法: 和, 以及抽象方法和受保护的方法。 The class is a partial implementation of the abstract class and supplies two additional methods: and , as well as the abstract and protected methods. 类支持编写站点地图提供程序 (例如), 将存储在持久性存储中的站点映射转换为存储在内存中的站点。 The class supports writing a site map provider (for example, an ) that translates a site map that is stored in persistent storage to one that is stored in memory. 类提供用于存储和检索对象的基本实现。 The class provides basic implementations for storing and retrieving objects. 和类支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念, 其中站点地图提供程序可与其他站点地图提供程序建立层次关系。The and classes support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, where a site map provider can have a hierarchical relationship with other site map providers. 此模式是通过和属性实现的。This pattern is implemented with the and properties. 类将其对象存储在哈希表中, 并在内部使用页的属性 (由站点地图节点表示) 作为键。The class stores its objects in hash tables and internally uses the property of the pages, represented by site map nodes, as keys. (如果站点地图节点未指定 URL, 则使用自动生成的唯一键跟踪该 URL。)因此, 您不能具有站点地图节点, 在此节点上, 具有相同 URL 的网站地图节点会被多次使用。(If a site map node does not specify a URL, it is tracked using an automatically generated unique key.) As a result, you cannot have site map nodes wherein a site map node with the same URL is used more than once. 例如, 尝试加载下面的代码示例中所示的站点地图节点, 该类是默认的 ASP.NET 站点地图提供程序, 或者任何派生自类的站点地图提供程序都不起作用, 因为多次使用 AboutUs 页。For example, attempting to load the site map node illustrated in the following code example with the class, which is the default ASP.NET site map provider, or any site map provider that is derived from the class will not work because the AboutUs.aspx page is used more than once. ``` ``` 如果要扩展类, 这三个最重要的方法是、 和方法。If you are extending the class, the three most important methods are the , , and methods. 和方法具有可满足大多数自定义站点地图提供程序实现的默认实现。The and methods have default implementations that are sufficient for most custom site map provider implementations. 调用方法以初始化派生的站点地图提供程序, 包括加载站点地图数据所需的任何资源, 但它确实尝试在内存中生成网站地图节点。The method is called to initialize derived site map providers, including any resources that are required to load site map data, but it does attempt to build the site map node in memory. 如果派生类使用文件来存储站点地图数据, 则可以在此处执行任何文件初始化。If your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed here. 如果站点地图节点使用某种其他类型的数据存储 (例如关系数据库), 则可能会在此处执行初始化连接。If the site map node uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a connection might be performed here. 其他属性 (如文件名) 或放置在配置中的站点地图提供程序元素上的连接字符串由 ASP.NET 配置系统处理, 并通过 `attributes`参数传递给方法。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings that are placed on the site map provider element in the configuration are processed by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with the `attributes` parameter. 必须由派生自类的所有类重写方法,并调用以从持久性存储区加载站点地图节点并将其转换为内部表示形式。The method must be overridden by all classes that are derived from the class and is called to load the site map node from persistent storage and convert it to an internal representation. 方法在 和类的许多默认成员实现中进行内部调用。 The method is called internally in many of the default member implementations of the and classes. 如果实现自己的站点地图提供程序, 请确保站点映射数据处理发生一次, 并且对方法的后续调用会立即返回, 前提是已加载了站点地图信息。If you implement your own site map provider, ensure that site map data processing occurs once and subsequent calls to the method return immediately, if site map information has already been loaded. 实现方法时, 请确保它是线程安全的, 因为多个并发页请求可能会在多个调用中间接导致加载站点地图信息。When you implement the method, ensure it is thread safe, as multiple concurrent page requests can result indirectly in multiple calls to load site map information. 站点地图基础结构支持基于用户的角色显示站点映射信息。The site map infrastructure supports displaying site map information based on the user's role. 根据单个对象支持的属性,不同的用户可能存在不同的导航结构。Depending on the property that are supported by the individual objects, a different navigation structure can exist for different users. 站点地图节点的默认实现检索类的成员通过调用方法自动执行安全修整。The default implementations of the site map node retrieval members of the class perform security trimming automatically by calling the method. 、和方法操作用于以线程安全方式跟踪站点地图节点的内部集合。 The , and methods manipulate the internal collections that are used to track site map nodes in a thread-safe manner. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类扩展为使用 Microsoft Access 作为站点地图提供程序。The following code example demonstrates how you to extend the class to use Microsoft Access as a site map provider. `AccessSiteMapProvider`类是一个站点地图提供程序, 仅支持一个简单的一级层次结构。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` class is a site map provider that supports only a simple, one-level-deep hierarchy. 存储站点地图数据的表具有以下结构:The table that the site map data is stored in has the following structure: ``` NODEID URL NAME PARENTNODEID --------------------------------------------- 1 default.aspx Default 2 catalog.aspx Catalog 1 3 aboutus.aspx Contact Us 1 ... ``` 类从类派生, 并使用基本的 SQL 查询和和对象从 Microsoft Access 数据库中检索信息。 `AccessSiteMapProvider`The `AccessSiteMapProvider` class is derived from the class and retrieves its information from a Microsoft Access database using basic SQL queries and the and objects. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#1)] 最后, `AccessSiteMapProvider`将配置为以下 web.config 文件中的默认提供程序。Finally, the `AccessSiteMapProvider` is configured as the default provider in the following Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意**此类不是直接实例化的。**Note** This class is not instantiated directly. 此构造函数是从类派生的类的构造函数中调用的。This constructor is called from the constructor of classes that are derived from the class.

summary.span: 向站点地图提供程序维护的集合添加一个 ，并建立 对象之间的父/子关系。

span.span: Adds a to the collections that are maintained by the site map provider and establishes a parent/child relationship between the objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由`node`参数标识的站点地图节点将添加到内部集合中, 并在它与`parentNode`参数标识的站点地图节点之间创建父子关系。The site map node that is identified by the `node` parameter is added to an internal collection and a parent-child relationship is created between it and the site map node that is identified by the `parentNode` parameter. 将站点地图节点添加到内部集合时, 该 URL 可能会被解释。The URL for a site map node might be interpreted when it is added to the internal collections. 应用程序相对 url 和相对 url 扩展到应用程序绝对虚拟路径, 这些路径随后用于存储和访问类的各个实例。Application-relative and relative URLs are expanded to application-absolute virtual paths, which are then used internally to store and access the individual instances of the class. 其他 Url (如物理路径、包含协议的路径和 UNC 路径) 不会被解释。Other URLs, such as physical paths, paths with protocols in them, and UNC paths, are not interpreted. 类派生自类, 并且是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序, 默认情况下, 在其内部集合中使用对象的属性作为查找键。 The class, which is derived from the class, and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果设置了的 属性,则它在站点地图提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法尝试基于其属性检索站点地图节点。 The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their property. 否则, 可以使用属性和相应的方法来检索站点地图节点。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 如果未指定或, 则站点地图提供程序将自动生成以跟踪站点地图节点。If no or is specified, the site map provider automatically generates a to track the site map nodes.

span.span: is .
The or is already registered with the .

exception.span: 站点地图节点必须由具有唯一 URL 或键的页构成。

span.span: A site map node must be made up of pages with unique URLs or keys.

para.span: 重写方法时, 请确保在使用方法添加站点地图节点时, 将属性设置为唯一值。

span.span: When overriding the method, ensure that the property is set to a unique value when adding the site map node using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode BuildSiteMap() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function BuildSiteMap () As SiteMapNode

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，从持久性存储区加载站点地图信息，并在内存中构建它。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads the site map information from persistent storage and builds it in memory.

returns.span: 站点地图导航结构的根 。

span.span: The root of the site map navigation structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是类的一个抽象成员。 The method is the one abstract member of the class. 调用方法以从持久性存储区加载和生成站点地图节点。The method is called to load and build the site map node from persistent storage. 实现方法时, 请确保它是线程安全的, 因为多个并发页面请求可能会在多个调用中间接导致加载站点地图信息。When you implement the method, ensure that it is thread-safe, because multiple concurrent page requests can result indirectly in multiple calls to load site map information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法, 以便从 Microsoft Access 数据库中检索数据, 并生成添加到根站点地图节点的集合中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method to retrieve data from a Microsoft Access database and build objects that are added to the collection of the root site map node. 最后, 将属性返回到调用方。Finally, the property is returned to the caller. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#4)]

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时, 请确保规范化添加到站点地图提供程序的对象的 url, 以便该方法可以检索站点地图节点, 而不管站点地图的 URL 是否将节点作为绝对虚拟路径或应用程序相对路径提供。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to normalize the URLs of objects that you add to your site map provider, so that the method can retrieve a site map node regardless of whether the URL for the site map node is supplied as an absolute virtual path or application relative path.

para.span: 使用方法的站点地图提供程序实现者应该在代表站点地图提供程序将对象存储到内部哈希表中之前规范化所有 url。

span.span: Site map provider implementers using the method should normalize any URLs before storing objects in the internal hash tables on behalf of the site map provider.

para.span: 安全修整行为包括在和类实现中。

span.span: Security trimming behavior is included in the and class implementations.

para.span: 但是, 若要使安全修整在派生类中正常工作, 必须在重写 方法时, 设置在生成站点地图提供程序时创建的任何对象的属性。

span.span: However, for security trimming to function in derived classes, you must set the property of any objects that you create while building a site map provider when you override the method.

summary.span: 移除 作为其状态的一部分来跟踪的父和子站点地图节点的集合中的所有元素。

span.span: Removes all elements in the collections of child and parent site map nodes that the tracks as part of its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类派生的类可以重写方法, 以执行其他清理操作, 具体取决于派生类维护的状态。Classes that are derived from the class can override the method to perform additional cleanup, depending on what state the derived classes maintain. 方法不会重置在方法过程中初始化的状态-它仅重置在方法中初始化的状态。 The method does not reset state that is initialized during the method - it resets only state that is initialized during the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以执行由类维护的状态的其他清理。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to perform additional cleanup of state that is maintained by the class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#3)]

Public Overrides Function FindSiteMapNode (rawUrl As String) As SiteMapNode

param.name: rawUrl

span.span: A URL that identifies the page for which to retrieve a .

summary.span: 检索表示位于指定 URL 处的页的 对象。

span.span: Retrieves a object that represents the page at the specified URL.

returns.span: 表示 所标识的页的 ；如果没有找到对应的站点地图节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the page identified by ; otherwise, , if no corresponding site map node is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的 URL 通常是虚拟 URL 或绝对 URL。The provided URL is typically a virtual or absolute URL. 它还可以是使用 ASP.NET 的应用程序相对语法的 URL, 例如`"~/apprelativedirectory"`。It can also be a URL that uses ASP.NET application-relative syntax, such as `"~/apprelativedirectory"`. 类会自动将应用程序相关的原始 url 规范化为绝对虚拟路径。The class automatically normalizes application-relative raw URLs to an absolute virtual path. 从派生的 对象是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序, 默认情况下, 它使用对象的属性作为其内部集合中的查找键。 The object, which is derived from the and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果设置了的 属性,则它在站点地图提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法尝试基于其检索站点地图节点。 The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their . 否则, 可以使用属性和相应的方法来检索站点地图节点。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 如果未指定或, 则站点地图提供程序将自动生成一个用于跟踪站点地图节点的属性。If no or is specified, the site map provider automatically generates a property to track the site map nodes.

span.span: is .

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时, 请确保将您添加到站点地图提供程序的对象的 url 规范化, 以便该方法可以检索站点地图节点, 而不管站点地图的 URL 是什么将节点作为绝对虚拟路径或应用程序相对路径提供。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to normalize the URLs of the objects that you add to your site map provider, so that the method can retrieve a site map node regardless of whether URL for the site map node is supplied as an absolute virtual path or an application relative path.

para.span: 安全修整行为包括在和类实现中。

span.span: Security trimming behavior is included in the and class implementations.

para.span: 但是, 若要使安全修整在派生类中正常工作, 必须在重写 方法时, 设置在生成站点地图提供程序时创建的任何对象的属性。

span.span: However, for security trimming to function in derived classes, you must set the property of any objects that you create while building a site map provider when you override the method.

span.span: A lookup key with which a is created.

span.span: Retrieves a object based on a specified key.

returns.span: 表示 所标识的页的 ；如果启用了安全修整而不能向当前用户显示该站点地图节点，或者未在站点地图节点集合中按 找到该站点地图节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the page identified by ; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the site map node cannot be shown to the current user or the site map node is not found in the site map node collection by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从内部对象检索基于`key`的站点地图节点。 The method retrieves a site map node from an internal object based on `key`. 默认情况下, 从类派生的 对象是ASP.NET的默认站点地图提供程序,默认情况下,在其内部集合中使用对象的属性作为查找键。The object, which is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果设置了的 属性,则它在站点地图提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法尝试基于其检索站点地图节点。 The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their . 否则, 可以使用属性和相应的方法来检索站点地图节点。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 具有一个默认实现, 该实现基于`key`参数查找类的实例。 The has a default implementation that looks up instances of the class based on the `key` parameter. 如果站点地图提供程序实施者使用了方法, 则已根据属性的值将引用存储到每个。If a site map provider implementer used the method, the already will have stored a reference to each based on the value of the property. 默认情况下, 为不具有属性值的类的实例生成 guid。By default, the generates GUIDs for instances of the class that do not have a value for the property. 自定义站点地图提供程序实现者必须提供自己的机制, 以便在 类的实例不具有属性值的事件中生成属性的唯一值。Custom site map provider implementers must provide their own mechanism for generating unique values of the property in the event that an instance of the class does not have a value for the property. 和类是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序实现, 它使用对象的 URL 作为类维护的各种集合中的键。 The and classes, which are the default site map provider implementation for ASP.NET, use the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection GetChildNodes(class System.Web.SiteMapNode node) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetChildNodes (node As SiteMapNode) As SiteMapNodeCollection

span.span: Retrieves the child site map nodes of a specific object.

returns.span: 包含 的子站点地图节点的只读 。

returns.span: 如果启用了安全修整，则该集合仅包含允许用户查看的站点地图节点。

span.span: If security trimming is enabled, the collection contains only site map nodes that the user is permitted to see.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象委托给站点地图提供程序, 以跟踪其子和父站点地图节点。The objects delegate to the site map provider to keep track of their child and parent site map nodes. 因此, 实现分层站点地图结构的站点地图提供程序的类 (如) 和使用对象来表示站点地图节点, 必须跟踪所有站点地图节点的层次结构关系, 才能导航整个层次结构树。As a result, classes that implement a site map provider for a hierarchical site map structure, such as , and use objects to represent site map nodes, must track the hierarchical relationships of all site map nodes in order to be able to navigate an entire hierarchical tree. 方法在内部调用方法以检索相对于指定站点地图节点并与当前用户相关的网站地图节点的只读集合。 The method calls the method internally to retrieve read-only collection of site map nodes that are relative to the specified site map node and relevant to the current user.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode GetParentNode(class System.Web.SiteMapNode node) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetParentNode (node As SiteMapNode) As SiteMapNode

param.name: node
param.span: 要检索其父站点地图节点的 。

span.span: The for which to retrieve the parent site map node.

summary.span: 检索特定 对象的父站点地图节点。

span.span: Retrieves the parent site map node of a specific object.

returns.span: 表示指定 的父级的 ；如果不存在父站点地图节点，或者不允许用户查看父站点地图节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the parent of the specified ; otherwise, , if no parent site map node exists or the user is not permitted to see the parent site map node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象委托给站点地图提供程序, 以跟踪其子和父站点地图节点。The objects delegate to the site map provider to keep track of their child and parent site map nodes. 因此, 实现层次结构站点地图结构的站点地图提供程序的类 (如类) 和使用对象来表示站点地图节点, 必须跟踪所有站点地图节点的层次结构关系, 才能能够导航整个层次结构树。As a result, classes that implement a site map provider for a hierarchical site map structure, such as the class, and use objects to represent site map nodes, must track the hierarchical relationships of all site map nodes in order to be able to navigate an entire hierarchical tree. 如果找不到 属性, 类将检测当前站点地图提供程序是否具有属性。 If a property is not found, the class detects whether the current site map provider has a property. 如果是这样, 则站点地图提供程序将调用父站点地图提供程序的属性。If so, the site map provider calls the property for the parent site map provider. 这样就可以实现以下方案: 站点地图节点的父站点地图节点由不同的站点地图提供程序维护。This enables the scenario where the parent site map node of a site map node is maintained by a different site map provider. 方法在内部 调用方法以检索表示指定站点地图节点的父节点的。 The method calls the method internally to retrieve the that represents the parent of the specified site map node. 如果启用了安全修整, 则仅当允许用户查看该节点时, 才返回该站点地图节点。If security trimming is enabled, the site map node is returned only if the user is permitted to see it.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 从站点地图提供程序跟踪的所有站点地图节点集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from all site map node collections that are tracked by the site map provider.
